## StandardMaterial class

The standard mesh material

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class StandardMaterial<T extends LightModel = LightModel> extends Material 
```
**Extends:** [Material](doc/markdown/./scene.material.md)

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)()](doc/markdown/./scene.standardmaterial._constructor_.md) |  | Creates an instance of StandardMaterial |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [alphaBlend](doc/markdown/./scene.standardmaterial.alphablend.md) |  | boolean | true if alpha blending is enabled |
|  [alphaCutoff](doc/markdown/./scene.standardmaterial.alphacutoff.md) |  | number | A value between 0 and 1, presents the cutoff for alpha testing |
|  [lightModel](doc/markdown/./scene.standardmaterial.lightmodel.md) |  | T | Light model of the material |
|  [opacity](doc/markdown/./scene.standardmaterial.opacity.md) |  | number | A value between 0 and 1, presents the opacity |
|  [vertexColor](doc/markdown/./scene.standardmaterial.vertexcolor.md) |  | boolean | true if vertex color attribute presents |
|  [vertexNormal](doc/markdown/./scene.standardmaterial.vertexnormal.md) |  | boolean | true if vertex normal attribute presents |
|  [vertexTangent](doc/markdown/./scene.standardmaterial.vertextangent.md) |  | boolean | true if vertex tangent attribute presents |
